Clifm is a shell-like, command-line file manager written in C. It provides powerful file management capabilities directly within the terminal, without relying on a graphical or text-based user interface, making it highly compatible with various terminal environments.

Museeks is a simple, clean, and cross-platform music player built with Electron and React. It focuses on core music playback features like library management, playlists, queue control, and playback speed adjustments, offering a straightforward user experience on Linux, macOS, and Windows.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Termux-Desktop is a shell script designed to easily install and manage Linux desktop environments and window managers within the Termux environment on Android devices. It supports various desktop styles, enables hardware acceleration, and offers options for GUI access via Termux:X11 or VNC, along with package management and containerization capabilities.

Open Scouts is an AI-powered web monitoring platform that allows users to create automated 'scouts' to continuously search the web for specific information. When a scout finds the desired content, it sends an email notification to the user, ensuring they stay updated on relevant changes or new information.

OpenScreen is a free, open-source desktop application for creating high-quality screen recordings and product demos. It offers essential features like screen/app recording, customizable zooms, annotations, and background customization, serving as a simpler alternative to paid software like Screen Studio.
